channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: Sternlicht 的喜达屋从 Blackstone 聘请 Jonathan Pollack

item.title: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）计划在周二与全球最大经济体的财政部长会晤前表示，美国经济的强劲一直是全球经济韧性的重要支柱
item.description:
The strength of the US economy has been a key bulwark of global economic resilience, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen plans to say Tuesday before meetings with her counterparts from the world’s biggest economies https://t.co/Qp5cBgnA8F

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 香港将在年度预算中巩固其暂时的经济复苏，并提升其作为全球金融中心的形象。
item.description:
Hong Kong will look to cement the city’s tentative economic recovery and burnish its image as a global financial center with its annual budget https://t.co/3JgeZEO4fI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 潜在的税收优惠刺激了包括百事可乐和 IBM 在内的美国公司通过其新加坡子公司出售债券，推动了该市借款人债券销售的创纪录激增。
item.description:
A potential tax benefit is spurring US companies including PepsiCo and IBM to sell bonds through their Singapore subsidiaries, fueling a record surge of sales from borrowers in the city state https://t.co/GAQTCU5Un0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 日本 1 月份的基准通胀率高于预期，支持日本央行继续朝着结束负利率政策的方向迈进
item.description:
Japan’s benchmark inflation gauge topped estimates in January, supporting the case for the Bank of Japan to continue moving toward ending its negative interest rate policy https://t.co/GRWiWXVCUq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国商店的通胀率放缓至 2022 年 3 月以来的最低水平，预示着家庭将进一步获得喘息机会
item.description:
Inflation in UK stores slowed to the lowest level since March 2022, signaling further respite for households https://t.co/auUX1ahpJR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：20 年来，出售股票首次比举债便宜。这可能意味着企业融资将发生重大变化。阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: For the first time in 20 years, selling shares is cheaper than taking on debt. That could mean big changes for corporate finance.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/O6h5ue0yzm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 堪萨斯城联储主席杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）在六个月前上任以来的首次重要讲话中敦促对降息保持耐心
item.description:
Kansas City Fed President Jeffrey Schmid urged patience on interest-rate cuts, in his first major speech since taking the job six months ago https://t.co/0iEDpfELdM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 日本将第二次出售主权过渡债券，但投资者的需求可能落后于首次交易
item.description:
Japan will sell sovereign transition bonds for the second time, but investor demand may lag the debut deal https://t.co/E48IYaNrKC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：大流行开始四年后，一种令人不安的模式正在形成：Covid不仅造成了一个世纪以来最多的死亡人数，还引发了致命的心脏病和中风浪潮。
item.description:
NEW: Four years after the start of the pandemic, a disturbing pattern is emerging: Not only did Covid result in the most deaths in a century, but it also triggered deadly waves of heart disease and stroke.

Scientists are trying to figure out why https://t.co/yLJhwJ5Fzx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: StanChart 在 2023 年因尼日利亚奈拉的波动而经历了一段疯狂的时期，一天内赚了 1.2 亿美元，几个月后又损失了数百万美元。
item.description:
StanChart had a wild 2023 with Nigeria's volatile naira, making $120 million in a day before losing millions months later https://t.co/1TOg0w7xnL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国不断增长的人口给财政大臣亨特的支出计划带来了更大的压力，他需要 250 亿英镑的补充资金来阻止对部分公共服务的新一轮削减。
item.description:
Britain’s growing population is ramping up pressure on Chancellor Hunt’s spending plans, requiring a £25 billion top-up to stop fresh cuts to some public services https://t.co/VrkYqWl3gn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 今年美国风险资产大涨有一个潜台词：在美元面前，别无选择
item.description:
There’s a subtext to this year’s blistering rally in US risk assets: When it comes to the dollar, there is no alternative https://t.co/lpZiLhrPQy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 远程保健公司 Hims & Hers 于 12 月开始提供减肥治疗，在盈利和预测超过预期后，其股价盘后上涨高达 21
item.description:
Shares of telehealth company Hims & Hers, which started offering weight-loss treatments in December, rose as much as 21% postmarket after earnings and forecasts beat estimates https://t.co/2hgcAGspTa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 🚨 现场问答：请在此微博回复您的问题 ⬇️@jwgale 和 @FayCortez 将于香港时间今天下午 12 点进行现场问答，为您解疑答惑。
item.description:
🚨 LIVE Q&A: Reply to this tweet with your questions ⬇️@jwgale and @FayCortez will be doing a live Q&A at 12pm HKT today to explain https://t.co/4bQavX6uxH

— Bloomberg (@business) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：大流行开始四年后，一种令人不安的模式正在形成：Covid不仅造成了一个世纪以来最多的死亡人数，还引发了致命的心脏病和中风浪潮。

NEW: Four years after the start of the pandemic, a disturbing pattern is emerging: Not only did Covid result in the most deaths in a century, but it also triggered deadly waves of heart disease and stroke.

Scientists are trying to figure out why https://t.co/OKjn2nXfxx

item.title: 20 年来，出售股票首次比举债便宜。这可能意味着企业融资将发生重大变化
item.description:
For the first time in 20 years, selling shares is cheaper than taking on debt. That could mean big changes for corporate finance https://t.co/LVcQdsu434

item.title: 亿万富翁创始人维贾伊-谢卡尔-夏尔马（Vijay Shekhar Sharma）从 Paytm 支付银行董事会辞职不到一个月，印度银行业监管机构实施的新限制措施扰乱了他的整个金融科技帝国。
item.description:
Billionaire founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma has resigned from Paytm Payments Bank’s board less than a month after India’s banking regulator slapped new curbs that have disrupted his entire fintech empire https://t.co/u937ODtHz4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 随着习近平主席提出 "共同富裕 "的号召，被中国政府诋毁为 "享乐主义者 "的中国金融业从业人员正在重新思考自己的职业生涯。
item.description:
Vilified by Beijing as “hedonists” over their lavish life styles, Chinese finance workers are rethinking their careers with President Xi Jinping’s call for “common prosperity” hitting salaries hard https://t.co/CPMXaSJllZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: #5Things：美股喘息。蓝筹债券销售在二月份创下新高。比特币创下两年新高。市场动态如下
item.description:
#5Things: US stocks take a breather. Blue-chip bond sales see a record February. Bitcoin notches a two-year high. Here’s what’s moving markets https://t.co/BPDqvncZBm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 欧盟的目标是到 2035 年在集团内部采购多达一半的防务系统，扭转从第三国购买大部分军事装备的趋势
item.description:
The European Union will aim to make as much as half of its defense system purchases within the bloc by 2035, reversing a trend of buying a majority of its military equipment from third countries https://t.co/GTwhgzlzdQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 阿根廷拉里奥哈省正面临 "前所未有的经济挑战"，为支付 2028 年到期的票据本金和票息，该省已聘请顾问与债券持有人进行谈判。
item.description:
Argentina’s La Rioja province has hired advisers to negotiate with bondholders as it’s facing “unprecedented economic challenges” to make principal and coupon payments on notes maturing in 2028. https://t.co/8aAVR13lUQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 快速时尚巨头 Shein 正在考虑将其梦寐以求的首次公开募股从纽约转到伦敦的可能性，因为在美国上市会遇到障碍
item.description:
Fast-fashion giant Shein is considering the possibility of switching its coveted IPO to London from New York because of hurdles to the listing in the US https://t.co/Aic8na8UfV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 埃克森公司正在考虑先发制人，阻止雪佛龙公司收购赫斯公司在圭亚那项目中的 30% 股份，这可能会阻碍计划中的 530 亿美元并购案。
item.description:
Exxon is considering pre-empting Chevron’s acquisition of Hess’ 30% stake in its Guyana project, potentially obstructing the planned $53 billion merger https://t.co/fm3q7Z88EV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 贾斯汀-特鲁多总理的政府出台了一项网络安全法，与欧洲国家一道试图迫使互联网公司积极监管和删除有害内容。
item.description:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government introduced an online safety law, joining European countries in trying to compel internet companies to actively regulate and remove harmful content https://t.co/NuqhKAM3fH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: BDT & MSD Partners 正寻求出售其在海上拖船服务公司 Marquette Transportation 的多数股权
item.description:
BDT & MSD Partners is looking to sell its majority stake in marine-towing service Marquette Transportation https://t.co/8CaOL4VmUx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 香港遍布着一些小商店，它们在现金和加密货币之间进行转换，几乎不需要问任何问题，这是对香港自由奔放的过去的现代回响。很快，在即将到来的打压下，许多商店可能会关闭
item.description:
Dotted across Hong Kong are small shops that convert between cash and crypto with few questions asked, a modern-day echo of the city’s freewheeling past. Soon, many may shut under a looming crackdown https://t.co/9uLLqRWCAL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024
